name: Monster Puzzle Adventure – the RPG minesweeper game
name_original: Monster Puzzle Adventure – the RPG minesweeper game
description:
Monster Puzzle Adventure: the new EPIC adventure by the same creators of Ninja Kid Run!

- PUZZLE meets adventure in a whole world to explore
- Easy SWIPE controls
- Unique amazing MONSTERS to collect
- Incredible ART and effects
- IMMERSIVE story & gameplay
- Can be played offline

Dive in this new epic, capture the monsters and be the most powerful Monster Sweeper on the land!
